00468 // Snap: Initializes gSaveDir global, creating the save directory if necessary
00469 // The save directory now resides in the data directory (default or custom)
00470 BOOLEAN InitSaveDir()
00471 {
00472       // Look for a custom data dir first
00473       std::string dataDir = gCustomDataCat.GetRootDir();
00474       if( dataDir.empty() || FileGetAttributes( (STR) dataDir.c_str() ) == 0xFFFFFFFF ) {
00475             dataDir = gDefaultDataCat.GetRootDir();
00476       }
00477 
00478       // The locale-specific save dir location is of the form L"..\\SavedGames"
00479       // This has not changed; instead, we strip the ".." at the beginning
00480       sprintf( (char *) gSaveDir, "%s%S", dataDir.c_str(), pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEDIRECTORY ] + 2 );
00481 
00482       // This was moved here from SaveGame
00483       //Check to see if the save directory exists
00484       if( FileGetAttributes( (STR) gSaveDir ) ==  0xFFFFFFFF )
00485       {
00486             //ok the direcotry doesnt exist, create it
00487             if( !MakeFileManDirectory( (CHAR8 *)gSaveDir ) )
00488             {
00489                   return FALSE;
00490             }
00491       }
00492 
00493       return TRUE;
00494 }
00495 
00496 
00497 BOOLEAN SaveGame( UINT8 ubSaveGameID, STR16 pGameDesc )
00498 {
00499       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00500       HWFILE      hFile=0;
00501       SAVED_GAME_HEADER SaveGameHeader;
00502       CHAR8       zSaveGameName[ MAX_PATH ];
00503       UINT32      uiSizeOfGeneralInfo = sizeof( GENERAL_SAVE_INFO );
00504       //UINT8           saveDir[100];
00505       BOOLEAN     fPausedStateBeforeSaving = gfGamePaused;
00506       BOOLEAN     fLockPauseStateBeforeSaving = gfLockPauseState;
00507       INT32       iSaveLoadGameMessageBoxID = -1;
00508       UINT16      usPosX, usActualWidth, usActualHeight;
00509       BOOLEAN fWePausedIt = FALSE;
00510 
00511 
00512       //sprintf( (char *) saveDir, "%S", pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEDIRECTORY ] );
00513 
00514 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00515 #ifndef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00516       //AssertMsg( uiSizeOfGeneralInfo == 1024, String( "Saved General info is NOT 1024, it is %d.  DF 1.", uiSizeOfGeneralInfo ) );
00517       //AssertMsg( sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ) == 7440, String( "LaptopSaveStruct is NOT 7440, it is %d.  DF 1.", sizeof( LaptopSaveInfoStruct ) ) );
00518 #endif
00519 #endif
00520 
00521       if( ubSaveGameID >= NUM_SAVE_GAMES && ubSaveGameID != SAVE__ERROR_NUM && ubSaveGameID != SAVE__END_TURN_NUM )
00522             return( FALSE );        //ddd
00523 
00524       //clear out the save game header
00525       memset( &SaveGameHeader, 0, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) );
00526 
00527       if ( !GamePaused() )
00528       {
00529             PauseBeforeSaveGame();
00530             fWePausedIt = TRUE;
00531       }
00532 
00533 
00534       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00535             InitShutDownMapTempFileTest( TRUE, "SaveMapTempFile", ubSaveGameID );
00536       #endif
00537 
00538 
00539       //Place a message on the screen telling the user that we are saving the game
00540       iSaveLoadGameMessageBoxID = PrepareMercPopupBox( iSaveLoadGameMessageBoxID, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, zSaveLoadText[ SLG_SAVING_GAME_MESSAGE ], 300, 0, 0, 0, &usActualWidth, &usActualHeight);
00541       usPosX = ( SCREEN_WIDTH - usActualWidth ) / 2 ;
00542 
00543       RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iSaveLoadGameMessageBoxID, usPosX, iScreenHeightOffset + 160, FRAME_BUFFER );
00544       
00545       InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00546 
00547       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
00548       EndFrameBufferRender( );
00549       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00550 
00551       if( RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iSaveLoadGameMessageBoxID ) )
00552       {
00553             iSaveLoadGameMessageBoxID = -1;
00554       }
00555 
00556       //
00557       // make sure we redraw the screen when we are done
00558       //
00559 
00560       //if we are in the game screen
00561       if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00562       {
00563             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00564       }
00565 
00566       else if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
00567       {
00568             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00569             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00570             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00571       }
00572 
00573       else if( guiCurrentScreen == SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN )
00574       {
00575             gfRedrawSaveLoadScreen = TRUE;
00576       }
00577 
00578 
00579 
00580 
00581       gubSaveGameLoc = ubSaveGameID;
00582 
00583 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00584       InitSaveGameFilePosition();
00585 #endif
00586 
00587 
00588       //Set the fact that we are saving a game
00589       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
00590 
00591 
00592       //Save the current sectors open temp files to the disk
00593       if( !SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile() )
00594       {
00595             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"ERROR in SaveCurrentSectorsInformationToTempItemFile()");
00596             goto FAILED_TO_SAVE;
00597       }
00598 
00599       //if we are saving the quick save,
00600       if( ubSaveGameID == 0 )
00601       {
00602 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00603             //Increment the quicksave counter
00604             guiCurrentQuickSaveNumber++;
00605 
00606             if( gfUseConsecutiveQuickSaveSlots )
00607                   swprintf( pGameDesc, L"%s%03d", pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICKSAVE_NAME ], guiCurrentQuickSaveNumber );
00608             else
00609 #endif
00610                   swprintf( pGameDesc, pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICKSAVE_NAME ] );
00611       }
00612 
00613       //If there was no string, add one
00614       if( pGameDesc[0] == '\0' )
00615             wcscpy( pGameDesc, pMessageStrings[ MSG_NODESC ] );
00616 
00617       //Check to see if the save directory exists
00618       /*if( FileGetAttributes( (STR) saveDir ) ==  0xFFFFFFFF )
00619       {
00620             //ok the direcotry doesnt exist, create it
00621             if( !MakeFileManDirectory( (CHAR8 *)saveDir ) ) 
00622             {
00623                   goto FAILED_TO_SAVE;
00624             }
00625       }*/
00626 
00627       //Create the name of the file
00628       CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( ubSaveGameID, zSaveGameName );
00629 
00630       //if the file already exists, delete it
00631       if( FileExists( zSaveGameName ) )
00632       {
00633             if( !FileDelete( zSaveGameName ) )
00634             {
00635                   goto FAILED_TO_SAVE;
00636             }
00637       }
00638 
00639       // create the save game file
00640       hFile = FileOpen( zSaveGameName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00641       if( !hFile )
00642       {
00643             goto FAILED_TO_SAVE;
00644       }
00645

01261       #endif
01262

01266       {
01267             goto FAILED_TO_SAVE;
01268       }
01269       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION

01271       #endif
01272 
01273 
01274       //do the new way of saving bobbyr mail order items
01275       if( !NewWayOfSavingBobbyRMailOrdersToSaveGameFile( hFile ) )
01276       {
01277             goto FAILED_TO_SAVE;
01278       }
01279       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01280       SaveGameFilePosition( FileGetPos( hFile ), "New way of saving Bobby R mailorders" );
01281       #endif
01282 
01283       
01284       //sss
01285 
01286       //Close the saved game file
01287       FileClose( hFile );
01288 
01289 
01290       //if we succesfully saved the game, mark this entry as the last saved game file
01291       if( ubSaveGameID != SAVE__ERROR_NUM && ubSaveGameID != SAVE__END_TURN_NUM )
01292       {
01293             gGameSettings.bLastSavedGameSlot = ubSaveGameID;
01294       }
01295 
01296       //Save the save game settings
01297       SaveGameSettings();
01298 
01299       //
01300       // Display a screen message that the save was succesful
01301       //
01302 
01303       //if its the quick save slot
01304       if( ubSaveGameID == 0 )
01305       {
01306             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVESUCCESS ] );
01307       }
01308 //#ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01309       else if( ubSaveGameID == SAVE__END_TURN_NUM )
01310       {
01311 //          ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_END_TURN_AUTO_SAVE ] );
01312       }
01313 //#endif
01314       else
01315       {
01316             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVESLOTSUCCESS ] );
01317       }
01318 
01319       //restore the music mode
01320       SetMusicMode( gubMusicMode );
01321 
01322       //Unset the fact that we are saving a game
01323       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
01324 
01325       UnPauseAfterSaveGame();
01326 
01327       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01328             InitShutDownMapTempFileTest( FALSE, "SaveMapTempFile", ubSaveGameID );
01329       #endif
01330 
01331       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01332             ValidateSoldierInitLinks( 2 );
01333       #endif
01334 
01335       //Check for enough free hard drive space
01336       NextLoopCheckForEnoughFreeHardDriveSpace();
01337 
01338       return( TRUE );
01339 
01340       //if there is an error saving the game
01341 FAILED_TO_SAVE:
01342 
01343 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01344       SaveGameFilePosition( FileGetPos( hFile ), "Failed to Save!!!" );
01345 #endif
01346 
01347       FileClose( hFile );
01348 
01349       if ( fWePausedIt )
01350       {
01351             UnPauseAfterSaveGame();
01352       }
01353 
01354       //Delete the failed attempt at saving
01355       DeleteSaveGameNumber( ubSaveGameID );
01356 
01357       //Put out an error message
01358       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_INTERFACE, zSaveLoadText[SLG_SAVE_GAME_ERROR] );
01359 
01360       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01361             InitShutDownMapTempFileTest( FALSE, "SaveMapTempFile", ubSaveGameID );
01362       #endif
01363 
01364       //Check for enough free hard drive space
01365       NextLoopCheckForEnoughFreeHardDriveSpace();
01366 
01367 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01368       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster || fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle )
01369       {
01370             gubReportMapscreenLock = 2;
01371       }
01372 #endif
01373 
01374       return( FALSE );
01375 }
01376 
01377 
01378 
01379 UINT32 guiBrokenSaveGameVersion = 0;
01380 
01381 BOOLEAN LoadSavedGame( UINT8 ubSavedGameID )
01382 {
01383       HWFILE      hFile;

01401 
01402   TrashAllSoldiers( );
01403 
01404       //Empty the dialogue Queue cause someone could still have a quote in waiting
01405       EmptyDialogueQueue( );
01406

01416       //AssertMsg( uiSizeOfGeneralInfo == 1024, String( "Saved General info is NOT 1024, it is %d.  DF 1.", uiSizeOfGeneralInfo ) );
01417 #endif
01418 
01419       //is it a valid save number
01420       if( ubSavedGameID >= NUM_SAVE_GAMES )
01421       {
01422             if( ubSavedGameID != SAVE__END_TURN_NUM )
01423                   return( FALSE );
01424       }
01425       else if( !gbSaveGameArray[ ubSavedGameID ] )
01426             return( FALSE );
01427 
01428 
01429       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01430             InitShutDownMapTempFileTest( TRUE, "LoadMapTempFile", ubSavedGameID );
01431       #endif
01432 
01433

01436

01439 
01440       gubSaveGameLoc = ubSavedGameID;
01441 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01442       InitLoadGameFilePosition();
01443 #endif
01444 
01445       //Set the fact that we are loading a saved game
01446       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= LOADING_SAVED_GAME;
01447 
01448       //Trash the existing world.  This is done to ensure that if we are loading a game that doesn't have 
01449       //a world loaded, that we trash it beforehand -- else the player could theoretically enter that sector
01450       //where it would be in a pre-load state.  
01451       TrashWorld();
01452

01459 
01460       //Create the name of the file
01461       CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( ubSavedGameID, zSaveGameName );
01462 
01463       // open the save game file
01464       hFile = FileOpen( zSaveGameName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
01465       if( !hFile )
01466       {
01467             FileClose( hFile );
01468             guiSaveGameVersion=0;
01469             return(FALSE);
01470       }
01471 
01472       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01473             LoadGameFilePosition( FileGetPos( hFile ), "Just Opened File" );
01474       #endif
01475 
01476 
01477       //Load the Save Game header file
01478       FileRead( hFile, &SaveGameHeader, sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01479       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SAVED_GAME_HEADER ) )
01480       {
01481             FileClose( hFile );
01482             return(FALSE);
01483       }
01484       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01485             LoadGameFilePosition( FileGetPos( hFile ), "Save Game Header" );
01486       #endif
01487

01489 
01490       guiBrokenSaveGameVersion = SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion;
01491

01493       if( SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion < 65 && !CHEATER_CHEAT_LEVEL( ) )
01494       {
01495 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01496             gfDisplaySaveGamesNowInvalidatedMsg = TRUE;
01497 #endif
01498             //Fail loading the save
01499             FileClose( hFile );
01500             guiSaveGameVersion=0;
01501             return(FALSE);
01502       }

01555             gfUseAlternateMap = TRUE;
01556       }
01557 
01558 
01559       //if the world was loaded when saved, reload it, otherwise dont
01560       if( SaveGameHeader.fWorldLoaded || SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion < 50 )
01561       {
01562             //Get the current world sector coordinates
01563             sLoadSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
01564             sLoadSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
01565             bLoadSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
01566             
01567             // This will guarantee that the sector will be loaded
01568             gbWorldSectorZ = -1;
01569 
01570 
01571             //if we should load a sector ( if the person didnt just start the game game )
01572             if( ( gWorldSectorX != 0 ) && ( gWorldSectorY != 0 ) )
01573             {
01574                   //Load the sector
01575                   SetCurrentWorldSector( sLoadSectorX, sLoadSectorY, bLoadSectorZ );
01576             }
01577       }
01578       else
01579       { //By clearing these values, we can avoid "in sector" checks -- at least, that's the theory.
01580             gWorldSectorX = gWorldSectorY = 0;
01581 
01582             //Since there is no 
01583             if( SaveGameHeader.sSectorX == -1 || SaveGameHeader.sSectorY == -1 || SaveGameHeader.bSectorZ == -1 )
01584                   gubLastLoadingScreenID = LOADINGSCREEN_HELI;
01585             else
01586                   gubLastLoadingScreenID = GetLoadScreenID( SaveGameHeader.sSectorX, SaveGameHeader.sSectorY, SaveGameHeader.bSectorZ );
01587 
01588             BeginLoadScreen();
01589       }
01590

01592       SetProgressBarColor( 0, 0, 0, 150 );
01593

01601 
01602       //if the world is unloaded, we must use the save buffer for the text

01604             SetProgressBarTextDisplayFlag( 0, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE );
01605       else
01606             SetProgressBarTextDisplayFlag( 0, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE );
01607 #endif
01608 
01609       uiRelStartPerc = 0;
01610

02736                   }

02739                   pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ]);
02740                   switch( Random( 4 ) )
02741                   {
02742                         case 0:
02743                               pProfile->sSectorX = 15;
02744                               pProfile->sSectorY = MAP_ROW_B;
02745                               pProfile->bSectorZ = 0;
02746                               break;
02747                         case 1:
02748                               pProfile->sSectorX = 14;
02749                               pProfile->sSectorY = MAP_ROW_E;
02750                               pProfile->bSectorZ = 0;
02751                               break;
02752                         case 2:
02753                               pProfile->sSectorX = 12;
02754                               pProfile->sSectorY = MAP_ROW_D;
02755                               pProfile->bSectorZ = 0;
02756                               break;
02757                         case 3:
02758                               pProfile->sSectorX = 16;
02759                               pProfile->sSectorY = MAP_ROW_C;
02760                               pProfile->bSectorZ = 0;
02761                               break;
02762                   }

02782 
02783       //Update the MERC merc contract lenght.  Before save version 77 the data was stored in the SOLDIERTYPE, 
02784       //after 77 the data is stored in the profile
02785       if ( SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion < 77 )
02786       {
02787             UpdateMercMercContractInfo();
02788       }
02789 
02790 
02791       if ( SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion <= 89 )
02792       {
02793             // ARM: A change was made in version 89 where refuel site availability now also depends on whether the player has
02794             // airspace control over that sector.  To update the settings immediately, must call it here.
02795             UpdateRefuelSiteAvailability();
02796       }
02797 
02798       if( SaveGameHeader.uiSavedGameVersion < 91 )
02799       {
02800             //update the amount of money that has been paid to speck
02801             CalcAproximateAmountPaidToSpeck();
02802       }
02803 
02804       gfLoadedGame = TRUE;
02805 
02806       uiRelEndPerc = 100;
02807       SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 0, uiRelStartPerc, uiRelEndPerc, L"Done!" );
02808       RenderProgressBar( 0, 100 );
02809 
02810       RemoveLoadingScreenProgressBar();
02811       
02812       SetMusicMode( gMusicModeToPlay );
02813 
02814 #ifndef JA2TESTVERSION
02815       RESET_CHEAT_LEVEL( );
02816 #endif
02817 
02818 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02819       if( fDisableDueToBattleRoster || fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle )
02820       {
02821             gubReportMapscreenLock = 1;
02822       }
02823 #endif
02824 
02825       // reset to 0
02826       guiSaveGameVersion=0;
02827 
02828       // reset once-per-convo records for everyone in the loaded sector
02829       ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForAllNPCsInLoadedSector();
02830 
02831       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
02832       {
02833             // fix lingering attack busy count problem on loading saved game by resetting a.b.c
02834             // if we're not in combat.
02835             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
02836       }
02837 
02838       // fix squads
02839       CheckSquadMovementGroups();
02840 
02841       //The above function LightSetBaseLevel adjusts ALL the level node light values including the merc node,
02842       //we must reset the values
02843       HandlePlayerTogglingLightEffects( FALSE );
02844 
02845 
02846       return( TRUE );
02847 }
02848

02854 
02855 BOOLEAN SaveMercProfiles( HWFILE hFile )
02856 {
02857       UINT16      cnt;
02858       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
02859       UINT32      uiSaveSize = sizeof( MERCPROFILESTRUCT );
02860 
02861       //Lopp through all the profiles to save
02862       for( cnt=0; cnt< NUM_PROFILES; cnt++)
02863       {
02864             gMercProfiles[ cnt ].uiProfileChecksum = ProfileChecksum( &(gMercProfiles[ cnt ]) );
02865             if ( guiSavedGameVersion < 87 )
02866             {
02867                   JA2EncryptedFileWrite( hFile, &gMercProfiles[cnt], uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02868             }
02869             else
02870             {
02871                   NewJA2EncryptedFileWrite( hFile, &gMercProfiles[cnt], uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02872             }
02873             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
02874             {
02875                   return(FALSE);
02876             }
02877       }
02878 
02879       return( TRUE );
02880 }

02884 BOOLEAN     LoadSavedMercProfiles( HWFILE hFile )
02885 {
02886       UINT16      cnt;
02887       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
02888 
02889       //Lopp through all the profiles to Load
02890       for( cnt=0; cnt< NUM_PROFILES; cnt++)
02891       {
02892             if ( guiSaveGameVersion < 87 )
02893             {
02894                   JA2EncryptedFileRead( hFile, &gMercProfiles[cnt], sizeof( MERCPROFILESTRUCT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02895             }
02896             else
02897             {
02898                   NewJA2EncryptedFileRead( hFile, &gMercProfiles[cnt], sizeof( MERCPROFILESTRUCT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02899             }
02900             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( MERCPROFILESTRUCT ) )
02901             {
02902                   return(FALSE);
02903             }
02904             if ( gMercProfiles[ cnt ].uiProfileChecksum != ProfileChecksum( &(gMercProfiles[ cnt ]) ) )
02905             {
02906                   return( FALSE );
02907             }
02908       }
02909 
02910       return( TRUE );
02911 }

02915 
02916 
02917             //Not saving any of these in the soldier struct

02935 
02936 BOOLEAN SaveSoldierStructure( HWFILE hFile )
02937 {
02938       UINT16      cnt;
02939       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
02940       UINT8       ubOne = 1;
02941       UINT8       ubZero = 0;
02942 
02943       UINT32      uiSaveSize = sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE );
02944 
02945 
02946 
02947       //Loop through all the soldier structs to save
02948       for( cnt=0; cnt< TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++)
02949       {     
02950 
02951             //if the soldier isnt active, dont add them to the saved game file.
02952             if( !Menptr[ cnt ].bActive )
02953             {
02954                   // Save the byte specifing to NOT load the soldiers 
02955                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubZero, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02956                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
02957                   {
02958                         return(FALSE);
02959                   }
02960             }
02961 
02962             else
02963             {
02964                   // Save the byte specifing to load the soldiers 
02965                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubOne, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02966                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
02967                   {
02968                         return(FALSE);
02969                   }
02970 
02971                   // calculate checksum for soldier
02972                   Menptr[ cnt ].uiMercChecksum = MercChecksum( &(Menptr[ cnt ]) );
02973                   // Save the soldier structure
02974                   if ( guiSavedGameVersion < 87 )
02975                   {
02976                         JA2EncryptedFileWrite( hFile, &Menptr[ cnt ], uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02977                   }
02978                   else
02979                   {
02980                         NewJA2EncryptedFileWrite( hFile, &Menptr[ cnt ], uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02981                   }
02982                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
02983                   {
02984                         return(FALSE);
02985                   }
02986 
02987 
02988 
02989                   //
02990                   // Save all the pointer info from the structure
02991                   //
02992 
02993 
02994                   //Save the pMercPath
02995                   if( !SaveMercPathFromSoldierStruct( hFile, (UINT8)cnt ) )
02996                         return( FALSE );
02997 
02998 
02999 
03000                   //
03001                   //do we have a    KEY_ON_RING                                                 *pKeyRing;
03002                   //
03003 
03004                   if( Menptr[ cnt ].pKeyRing != NULL )
03005                   {
03006                         // write to the file saying we have the ....
03007                         FileWrite( hFile, &ubOne, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03008                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
03009                         {
03010                               return(FALSE);
03011                         }
03012 
03013                         // Now save the ....
03014                         FileWrite( hFile, Menptr[ cnt ].pKeyRing, NUM_KEYS * sizeof( KEY_ON_RING ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03015                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != NUM_KEYS * sizeof( KEY_ON_RING ) )
03016                         {
03017                               return(FALSE);
03018                         }
03019                   }
03020                   else
03021                   {
03022                         // write to the file saying we DO NOT have the Key ring
03023                         FileWrite( hFile, &ubZero, 1, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03024                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != 1 )
03025                         {
03026                               return(FALSE);
03027                         }
03028                   }
03029             }
03030       }
03031 
03032       return( TRUE );
03033 }
03034 
03035 
03036 
03037 BOOLEAN LoadSoldierStructure( HWFILE hFile )
03038 {
03039       UINT16      cnt;
03040       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
03041       SOLDIERTYPE SavedSoldierInfo;
03042       UINT32      uiSaveSize = sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE );
03043       UINT8       ubId;
03044       UINT8       ubOne = 1;
03045       UINT8       ubActive = 1;
03046       UINT32      uiPercentage;
03047 
03048       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT CreateStruct;
03049 
03050       //Loop through all the soldier and delete them all
03051       for( cnt=0; cnt< TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++)
03052       {     
03053             TacticalRemoveSoldier( cnt );
03054       }
03055 
03056 
03057 
03058       //Loop through all the soldier structs to load
03059       for( cnt=0; cnt< TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++)
03060       {     
03061 
03062             //update the progress bar
03063             uiPercentage = (cnt * 100) / (TOTAL_SOLDIERS-1);
03064 
03065             RenderProgressBar( 0, uiPercentage );
03066 
03067 
03068             //Read in a byte to tell us whether or not there is a soldier loaded here.
03069             FileRead( hFile, &ubActive, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
03070             if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
03071             {
03072                   return(FALSE);
03073             }
03074 
03075             // if the soldier is not active, continue 
03076             if( !ubActive )
03077             {
03078                   continue;
03079             }
03080 
03081             // else if there is a soldier 
03082             else
03083             {
03084                   //Read in the saved soldier info into a Temp structure
03085                   if ( guiSaveGameVersion < 87 )
03086                   {
03087                         JA2EncryptedFileRead( hFile, &SavedSoldierInfo, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
03088                   }
03089                   else
03090                   {
03091                         NewJA2EncryptedFileRead( hFile, &SavedSoldierInfo, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
03092                   }
03093                   if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSaveSize )
03094                   {
03095                         return(FALSE);
03096                   }
03097                   // check checksum
03098                   if ( MercChecksum( &SavedSoldierInfo ) != SavedSoldierInfo.uiMercChecksum )
03099                   {
03100                         return( FALSE );
03101                   }
03102 
03103                   //Make sure all the pointer references are NULL'ed out.  
03104                   SavedSoldierInfo.pTempObject   = NULL;
03105                   SavedSoldierInfo.pKeyRing      = NULL;
03106                   SavedSoldierInfo.p8BPPPalette  = NULL;
03107                   SavedSoldierInfo.p16BPPPalette       = NULL;
03108                   memset( SavedSoldierInfo.pShades, 0, sizeof( UINT16* ) * NUM_SOLDIER_SHADES );
03109                   memset( SavedSoldierInfo.pGlowShades, 0, sizeof( UINT16* ) * 20 );
03110                   SavedSoldierInfo.pCurrentShade       = NULL;
03111                   SavedSoldierInfo.pThrowParams  = NULL;
03112                   SavedSoldierInfo.pLevelNode    = NULL;
03113                   SavedSoldierInfo.pExternShadowLevelNode    = NULL;
03114                   SavedSoldierInfo.pRoofUILevelNode    = NULL;
03115                   SavedSoldierInfo.pBackGround   = NULL;
03116                   SavedSoldierInfo.pZBackground  = NULL;
03117                   SavedSoldierInfo.pForcedShade  = NULL;
03118                   SavedSoldierInfo.pMercPath     = NULL;
03119                   memset( SavedSoldierInfo.pEffectShades, 0, sizeof( UINT16* ) * NUM_SOLDIER_EFFECTSHADES );
03120 
03121 
03122                   //if the soldier wasnt active, dont add them now.  Advance to the next merc
03123       //if( !SavedSoldierInfo.bActive )
03124       //    continue;
03125 
03126 
03127                   //Create the new merc
03128                   memset( &CreateStruct, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) );
03129                   CreateStruct.bTeam                                                = SavedSoldierInfo.bTeam;
03130                   CreateStruct.ubProfile                                = SavedSoldierInfo.ubProfile;
03131                   CreateStruct.fUseExistingSoldier    = TRUE;
03132                   CreateStruct.pExistingSoldier             = &SavedSoldierInfo;
03133 
03134                   if( !TacticalCreateSoldier( &CreateStruct, &ubId ) )
03135                         return( FALSE );
03136 
03137 
03138                   // Load the pMercPath
03139                   if( !LoadMercPathToSoldierStruct( hFile, ubId ) )
03140                         return( FALSE );
03141 
03142 
03143                   //
03144                   //do we have a    KEY_ON_RING                                                 *pKeyRing;
03145                   //
03146 
03147                   // Read the file to see if we have to load the keys
03148                   FileRead( hFile, &ubOne, 1, &uiNumBytesRead );
03149                   if( uiNumBytesRead != 1 )
03150                   {
03151                         return(FALSE);
03152                   }
03153 
03154                   if( ubOne )
03155                   {
03156                         // Now Load the ....
03157                         FileRead( hFile, Menptr[ cnt ].pKeyRing, NUM_KEYS * sizeof( KEY_ON_RING ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03158                         if( uiNumBytesRead != NUM_KEYS * sizeof( KEY_ON_RING ) )
03159                         {
03160                               return(FALSE);
03161                         }
03162                   
03163                   }
03164                   else
03165                   {
03166                         Assert( Menptr[ cnt ].pKeyRing == NULL );
03167                   }
03168 
03169                   //if the soldier is an IMP character
03170                   if( Menptr[cnt].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__PLAYER_CHARACTER && Menptr[cnt].bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03171                   {
03172                         ResetIMPCharactersEyesAndMouthOffsets( Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile );
03173                   }
03174 
03175                   //if the saved game version is before x, calculate the amount of money paid to mercs
03176                   if( guiSaveGameVersion < 83 )
03177                   {
03178                         //if the soldier is someone
03179                         if( Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03180                         {
03181                               if( Menptr[cnt].ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__MERC )
03182                               {
03183                                     gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile ].uiTotalCostToDate = gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile ].sSalary * gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile ].iMercMercContractLength;
03184                               }
03185                               else
03186                               {
03187                                     gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile ].uiTotalCostToDate = gMercProfiles[ Menptr[ cnt ].ubProfile ].sSalary * Menptr[ cnt ].iTotalContractLength;
03188                               }
03189                         }
03190                   }
03191 
03192 #ifdef GERMAN
03193                   // Fix neutral flags
03194                   if ( guiSaveGameVersion < 94 )
03195                   {
03196                         if ( Menptr[ cnt].bTeam == OUR_TEAM && Menptr[ cnt ].bNeutral && Menptr[ cnt ].bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW )
03197                         {
03198                               // turn off neutral flag
03199                               Menptr[ cnt].bNeutral = FALSE;
03200                         }
03201                   }
03202 #endif
03203                   // JA2Gold: fix next-to-previous attacker value
03204                   if ( guiSaveGameVersion < 99 )
03205                   {
03206                         Menptr[ cnt ].ubNextToPreviousAttackerID = NOBODY;
03207                   }
03208 
03209             }
03210       }
03211 
03212       // Fix robot
03213       if ( guiSaveGameVersion <= 87 )
03214       {
03215             SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
03216 
03217             if ( gMercProfiles[ ROBOT ].inv[ VESTPOS ] == SPECTRA_VEST )
03218             {
03219                   // update this
03220                   gMercProfiles[ ROBOT ].inv[ VESTPOS ] = SPECTRA_VEST_18;
03221                   gMercProfiles[ ROBOT ].inv[ HELMETPOS ] = SPECTRA_HELMET_18;
03222                   gMercProfiles[ ROBOT ].inv[ LEGPOS ] = SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18;
03223                   gMercProfiles[ ROBOT ].bAgility = 50;
03224                   pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ROBOT, FALSE );
03225                   if ( pSoldier )
03226                   {
03227                         pSoldier->inv[ VESTPOS ].usItem = SPECTRA_VEST_18;
03228                         pSoldier->inv[ HELMETPOS ].usItem = SPECTRA_HELMET_18;
03229                         pSoldier->inv[ LEGPOS ].usItem = SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18;
03230                         pSoldier->bAgility = 50;
03231                   }
03232             }
03233       }
03234 
03235       return( TRUE );
03236 }
03237

03326 
03327 BOOLEAN SaveFilesToSavedGame( STR pSrcFileName, HWFILE hFile )
03328 {
03329       UINT32      uiFileSize;
03330       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03331       HWFILE      hSrcFile;
03332       UINT8       *pData;
03333       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
03334 
03335 
03336       //open the file
03337       hSrcFile = FileOpen( pSrcFileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
03338       if( !hSrcFile )
03339       {
03340             return( FALSE );
03341       }
03342 
03343       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
03344       guiNumberOfMapTempFiles++;          //Increment counter:  To determine where the temp files are crashing
03345       #endif
03346 
03347       
03348       //Get the file size of the source data file
03349       uiFileSize = FileGetSize( hSrcFile );
03350       if( uiFileSize == 0 )
03351             return( FALSE );
03352 
03353       // Write the the size of the file to the saved game file
03354       FileWrite( hFile, &uiFileSize, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03355       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03356       {
03357             return(FALSE);
03358       }
03359 
03360 
03361 
03362       //Allocate a buffer to read the data into
03363       pData = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
03364       if( pData == NULL )
03365             return( FALSE );
03366       memset( pData, 0, uiFileSize);
03367 
03368       // Read the saource file into the buffer
03369       FileRead( hSrcFile, pData, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
03370       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiFileSize )
03371       {
03372             //Free the buffer
03373             MemFree( pData );
03374 
03375             return(FALSE);
03376       }
03377 
03378 
03379 
03380       // Write the buffer to the saved game file
03381       FileWrite( hFile, pData, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03382       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiFileSize )
03383       {
03384             //Free the buffer
03385             MemFree( pData );
03386 
03387             return(FALSE);
03388       }
03389 
03390       //Free the buffer
03391       MemFree( pData );
03392 
03393       //Clsoe the source data file
03394       FileClose( hSrcFile );
03395 
03396       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
03397       //Write out the name of the temp file so we can track whcih ones get loaded, and saved
03398             WriteTempFileNameToFile( pSrcFileName, uiFileSize, hFile );
03399       #endif
03400 
03401       return( TRUE );
03402 }
03403 
03404 
03405 BOOLEAN LoadFilesFromSavedGame( STR pSrcFileName, HWFILE hFile )
03406 {
03407       UINT32      uiFileSize;
03408       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03409       HWFILE      hSrcFile;
03410       UINT8       *pData;
03411       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
03412 
03413       
03414 
03415       //If the source file exists, delete it
03416       if( FileExists( pSrcFileName ) )
03417       {
03418             if( !FileDelete( pSrcFileName ) )
03419             {
03420                   //unable to delete the original file
03421                   return( FALSE );
03422             }
03423       }
03424 
03425       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
03426       guiNumberOfMapTempFiles++;          //Increment counter:  To determine where the temp files are crashing
03427       #endif
03428 
03429       //open the destination file to write to
03430       hSrcFile = FileOpen( pSrcFileName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
03431       if( !hSrcFile )
03432       {
03433             //error, we cant open the saved game file
03434             return( FALSE );
03435       }
03436 
03437       
03438       // Read the size of the data 
03439       FileRead( hFile, &uiFileSize, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03440       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03441       {
03442             FileClose( hSrcFile );
03443             
03444             return(FALSE);
03445       }
03446 
03447 
03448       //if there is nothing in the file, return;
03449       if( uiFileSize == 0 )
03450       {
03451             FileClose( hSrcFile );
03452             return( TRUE );
03453       }
03454 
03455       //Allocate a buffer to read the data into
03456       pData = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
03457       if( pData == NULL )
03458       {
03459             FileClose( hSrcFile );
03460             return( FALSE );
03461       }
03462 
03463 
03464       // Read into the buffer
03465       FileRead( hFile, pData, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
03466       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiFileSize )
03467       {
03468             FileClose( hSrcFile );
03469             
03470             //Free the buffer
03471             MemFree( pData );
03472 
03473             return(FALSE);
03474       }
03475 
03476 
03477 
03478       // Write the buffer to the new file
03479       FileWrite( hSrcFile, pData, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03480       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiFileSize )
03481       {
03482             FileClose( hSrcFile );
03483             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FAILED to Write to the %s File", pSrcFileName ) );
03484             //Free the buffer
03485             MemFree( pData );
03486 
03487             return(FALSE);
03488       }
03489 
03490       //Free the buffer
03491       MemFree( pData );
03492 
03493       //Close the source data file
03494       FileClose( hSrcFile );
03495 
03496       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
03497             WriteTempFileNameToFile( pSrcFileName, uiFileSize, hFile );
03498       #endif
03499       return( TRUE );
03500 }
03501 
03502 
03503 BOOLEAN SaveEmailToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
03504 {
03505       UINT32      uiNumOfEmails=0;
03506       UINT32            uiSizeOfEmails=0;
03507       EmailPtr    pEmail = pEmailList;
03508       EmailPtr pTempEmail = NULL;
03509       UINT32      cnt;
03510       UINT32      uiStringLength=0;
03511       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03512 
03513       SavedEmailStruct SavedEmail;
03514 
03515       //loop through all the email to find out the total number
03516       while(pEmail)
03517       {
03518             pEmail=pEmail->Next;
03519             uiNumOfEmails++;
03520       }
03521 
03522       uiSizeOfEmails = sizeof( Email ) * uiNumOfEmails;
03523 
03524       //write the number of email messages
03525       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumOfEmails, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03526       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03527       {
03528             return(FALSE);
03529       }
03530 
03531 
03532       //loop trhough all the emails, add each one individually
03533       pEmail = pEmailList;
03534       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumOfEmails; cnt++)
03535       {
03536             //Get the strng length of the subject
03537             uiStringLength = ( wcslen( pEmail->pSubject ) + 1 ) * 2;
03538 
03539             //write the length of the current emails subject to the saved game file
03540             FileWrite( hFile, &uiStringLength, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03541             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03542             {
03543                   return(FALSE);
03544             }
03545 
03546             //write the subject of the current email to the saved game file
03547             FileWrite( hFile, pEmail->pSubject, uiStringLength, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03548             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiStringLength )
03549             {
03550                   return(FALSE);
03551             }
03552 
03553 
03554             //Get the current emails data and asign it to the 'Saved email' struct
03555             SavedEmail.usOffset = pEmail->usOffset;
03556             SavedEmail.usLength = pEmail->usLength;
03557             SavedEmail.ubSender = pEmail->ubSender;
03558             SavedEmail.iDate = pEmail->iDate;
03559             SavedEmail.iId = pEmail->iId;
03560             SavedEmail.iFirstData = pEmail->iFirstData;
03561             SavedEmail.uiSecondData = pEmail->uiSecondData;
03562             SavedEmail.fRead = pEmail->fRead;
03563             SavedEmail.fNew = pEmail->fNew;
03564             SavedEmail.iThirdData = pEmail->iThirdData;
03565             SavedEmail.iFourthData = pEmail->iFourthData;
03566             SavedEmail.uiFifthData = pEmail->uiFifthData;
03567             SavedEmail.uiSixData = pEmail->uiSixData;
03568 
03569 
03570             // write the email header to the saved game file
03571             FileWrite( hFile, &SavedEmail, sizeof( SavedEmailStruct ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03572             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( SavedEmailStruct ) )
03573             {
03574                   return(FALSE);
03575             }
03576 
03577             //advance to the next email
03578             pEmail = pEmail->Next;
03579       }
03580 
03581       return( TRUE );
03582 }
03583 
03584 
03585 BOOLEAN LoadEmailFromSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
03586 {
03587       UINT32            uiNumOfEmails=0;
03588       UINT32            uiSizeOfSubject=0;
03589       EmailPtr    pEmail = pEmailList;
03590       EmailPtr    pTempEmail = NULL;
03591       UINT8             *pData = NULL;
03592       UINT32            cnt;
03593       SavedEmailStruct SavedEmail;
03594       UINT32            uiNumBytesRead=0;
03595 
03596       //Delete the existing list of emails
03597       ShutDownEmailList();
03598 
03599       pEmailList = NULL;
03600       //Allocate memory for the header node
03601       pEmailList = (EmailPtr) MemAlloc( sizeof( Email ) );
03602       if( pEmailList == NULL )
03603             return( FALSE );
03604 
03605       memset( pEmailList, 0, sizeof( Email ) );
03606 
03607       //read in the number of email messages
03608       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumOfEmails, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03609       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03610       {
03611             return(FALSE);
03612       }
03613 
03614       //loop through all the emails, add each one individually
03615       pEmail = pEmailList;
03616       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumOfEmails; cnt++)
03617       {
03618             //get the length of the email subject
03619             FileRead( hFile, &uiSizeOfSubject, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03620             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03621             {
03622                   return(FALSE);
03623             }
03624 
03625             //allocate space for the subject
03626             pData = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( EMAIL_SUBJECT_LENGTH * sizeof( wchar_t ) );
03627             if( pData == NULL )
03628                   return( FALSE );
03629             memset( pData, 0, EMAIL_SUBJECT_LENGTH * sizeof( wchar_t ) );
03630 
03631             //Get the subject
03632             FileRead( hFile, pData, uiSizeOfSubject, &uiNumBytesRead );
03633             if( uiNumBytesRead != uiSizeOfSubject )
03634             {
03635                   return(FALSE);
03636             }
03637 
03638             //get the rest of the data from the email
03639             FileRead( hFile, &SavedEmail, sizeof( SavedEmailStruct ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03640             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SavedEmailStruct ) )
03641             {
03642                   return(FALSE);
03643             }
03644 
03645             //
03646             //add the email
03647             //
03648 
03649             //if we havent allocated space yet
03650             pTempEmail = (EmailPtr) MemAlloc( sizeof( Email ) );
03651             if( pTempEmail == NULL )
03652                   return( FALSE );
03653             memset( pTempEmail, 0, sizeof( Email ) );
03654 
03655             pTempEmail->usOffset = SavedEmail.usOffset;
03656             pTempEmail->usLength = SavedEmail.usLength;
03657             pTempEmail->ubSender = SavedEmail.ubSender;
03658             pTempEmail->iDate = SavedEmail.iDate;
03659             pTempEmail->iId = SavedEmail.iId;
03660             pTempEmail->fRead = SavedEmail.fRead;
03661             pTempEmail->fNew = SavedEmail.fNew;
03662             pTempEmail->pSubject = (STR16) pData;
03663             pTempEmail->iFirstData = SavedEmail.iFirstData;
03664             pTempEmail->uiSecondData = SavedEmail.uiSecondData;
03665             pTempEmail->iThirdData = SavedEmail.iThirdData;
03666             pTempEmail->iFourthData = SavedEmail.iFourthData;
03667             pTempEmail->uiFifthData = SavedEmail.uiFifthData;
03668             pTempEmail->uiSixData = SavedEmail.uiSixData;
03669 
03670 
03671             //add the current email in
03672             pEmail->Next = pTempEmail;
03673             pTempEmail->Prev = pEmail;
03674 
03675             //moved to the next email
03676             pEmail = pEmail->Next;
03677 
03678             AddMessageToPages( pTempEmail->iId );
03679 
03680       }
03681 
03682       //if there are emails
03683       if( cnt )
03684       {
03685             //the first node of the LL was a dummy, node,get rid  of it
03686             pTempEmail = pEmailList;
03687             pEmailList = pEmailList->Next;
03688             pEmailList->Prev = NULL;
03689             MemFree( pTempEmail );
03690       }
03691       else
03692       {
03693             MemFree( pEmailList );
03694             pEmailList = NULL;
03695       }
03696 
03697       return( TRUE );
03698 }
03699

03701 BOOLEAN SaveTacticalStatusToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
03702 {
03703       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
03704 
03705       //write the gTacticalStatus to the saved game file
03706       FileWrite( hFile, &gTacticalStatus, sizeof( TacticalStatusType ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03707       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( TacticalStatusType ) )
03708       {
03709             return(FALSE);
03710       }
03711 
03712       //
03713       //Save the current sector location to the saved game file
03714       //
03715 
03716       // save gWorldSectorX
03717       FileWrite( hFile, &gWorldSectorX, sizeof( gWorldSectorX ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03718       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( gWorldSectorX ) )
03719       {
03720             return(FALSE);
03721       }
03722 
03723 
03724       // save gWorldSectorY
03725       FileWrite( hFile, &gWorldSectorY, sizeof( gWorldSectorY ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03726       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( gWorldSectorY ) )
03727       {
03728             return(FALSE);
03729       }
03730 
03731 
03732       // save gbWorldSectorZ
03733       FileWrite( hFile, &gbWorldSectorZ, sizeof( gbWorldSectorZ ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03734       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( gbWorldSectorZ ) )
03735       {
03736             return(FALSE);
03737       }
03738 
03739       return( TRUE );
03740 }

03799 BOOLEAN SetMercsInsertionGridNo( )
03800 {
03801       UINT16 cnt=0;
03802 
03803   // loop through all the mercs
03804   for ( cnt=0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
03805       {     
03806             //if the soldier is active
03807             if( Menptr[ cnt ].bActive )
03808             {
03809                   
03810                   if( Menptr[ cnt ].sGridNo != NOWHERE )
03811                   {
03812                         //set the insertion type to gridno
03813                         Menptr[ cnt ].ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_GRIDNO;
03814 
03815                         //set the insertion gridno
03816                         Menptr[ cnt ].usStrategicInsertionData = Menptr[ cnt ].sGridNo;
03817 
03818                         //set the gridno
03819                         Menptr[ cnt ].sGridNo = NOWHERE;
03820                   }
03821             }
03822       }
03823 
03824       return( TRUE );
03825 }

03828 BOOLEAN SaveOppListInfoToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
03829 {
03830       UINT32      uiSaveSize=0;
03831       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03832 
03833 
03834       // Save the Public Opplist
03835       uiSaveSize = MAXTEAMS * TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
03836       FileWrite( hFile, gbPublicOpplist, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03837       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03838       {
03839             return( FALSE );
03840       }
03841 
03842       // Save the Seen Oppenents
03843       uiSaveSize = TOTAL_SOLDIERS * TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
03844       FileWrite( hFile, gbSeenOpponents, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03845       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03846       {
03847             return( FALSE );
03848       }
03849       
03850 
03851       
03852       // Save the Last Known Opp Locations
03853       uiSaveSize = TOTAL_SOLDIERS * TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
03854       FileWrite( hFile, gsLastKnownOppLoc, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03855       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03856       {
03857             return( FALSE );
03858       }
03859       
03860       // Save the Last Known Opp Level
03861       uiSaveSize = TOTAL_SOLDIERS * TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
03862       FileWrite( hFile, gbLastKnownOppLevel, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03863       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03864       {
03865             return( FALSE );
03866       }
03867 
03868       
03869       // Save the Public Last Known Opp Locations
03870       uiSaveSize = MAXTEAMS * TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
03871       FileWrite( hFile, gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03872       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03873       {
03874             return( FALSE );
03875       }
03876 
03877       // Save the Public Last Known Opp Level
03878       uiSaveSize = MAXTEAMS * TOTAL_SOLDIERS;
03879       FileWrite( hFile, gbPublicLastKnownOppLevel, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03880       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03881       {
03882             return( FALSE );
03883       }
03884 
03885 
03886       // Save the Public Noise Volume
03887       uiSaveSize = MAXTEAMS;
03888       FileWrite( hFile, gubPublicNoiseVolume, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03889       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03890       {
03891             return( FALSE );
03892       }
03893 
03894       // Save the Public Last Noise Gridno
03895       uiSaveSize = MAXTEAMS;
03896       FileWrite( hFile, gsPublicNoiseGridno, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03897       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03898       {
03899             return( FALSE );
03900       }
03901 
03902 
03903 
03904       return( TRUE );
03905 }

03984 BOOLEAN SaveWatchedLocsToSavedGame( HWFILE hFile )
03985 {

03988       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03989 
03990       uiArraySize = TOTAL_SOLDIERS * NUM_WATCHED_LOCS;
03991

03993       uiSaveSize = uiArraySize * sizeof( INT16 );
03994       FileWrite( hFile, gsWatchedLoc, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03995       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
03996       {
03997             return( FALSE );
03998       }
03999 
04000       uiSaveSize = uiArraySize * sizeof( INT8 );
04001 
04002       FileWrite( hFile, gbWatchedLocLevel, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04003       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
04004       {
04005             return( FALSE );
04006       }
04007 
04008       FileWrite( hFile, gubWatchedLocPoints, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04009       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
04010       {
04011             return( FALSE );
04012       }
04013 
04014       FileWrite( hFile, gfWatchedLocReset, uiSaveSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04015       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiSaveSize )
04016       {
04017             return( FALSE );
04018       }
04019 
04020       return( TRUE );
04021 }

04061 
04062 void CreateSavedGameFileNameFromNumber( UINT8 ubSaveGameID, STR pzNewFileName )
04063 {
04064       //if we are creating the QuickSave file
04065       if( ubSaveGameID == 0 )
04066       {
04067 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04068             //if the user wants to have consecutive quick saves
04069             if( gfUseConsecutiveQuickSaveSlots )
04070             {
04071                   //if we are loading a game, and the user hasnt saved any consecutinve saves, load the defualt save
04072                   if( guiCurrentQuickSaveNumber == 0 )
04073                         sprintf( pzNewFileName , "%s\\%S.%S", gSaveDir, pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICKSAVE_NAME ], pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
04074                   else
04075                         sprintf( pzNewFileName , "%s\\%S%02d.%S", gSaveDir, pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICKSAVE_NAME ], guiCurrentQuickSaveNumber, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
04076             }
04077             else
04078 #endif
04079                   sprintf( pzNewFileName , "%s\\%S.%S", gSaveDir, pMessageStrings[ MSG_QUICKSAVE_NAME ], pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
04080       }
04081 //#ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04082       else if( ubSaveGameID == SAVE__END_TURN_NUM )
04083       {
04084             //The name of the file
04085             sprintf( pzNewFileName , "%s\\Auto%02d.%S", gSaveDir, guiLastSaveGameNum, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
04086 
04087             //increment end turn number
04088             guiLastSaveGameNum++;
04089 
04090             //just have 2 saves
04091             if( guiLastSaveGameNum == 2 )
04092             {
04093                   guiLastSaveGameNum = 0;
04094             }
04095       }
04096 //#endif
04097 
04098       else
04099             sprintf( pzNewFileName , "%s\\%S%02d.%S", gSaveDir, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVE_NAME ], ubSaveGameID, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
04100 }
04101 
04102 
04103 
04104 
04105 BOOLEAN SaveMercPathFromSoldierStruct( HWFILE hFile, UINT8  ubID )
04106 {
04107       UINT32      uiNumOfNodes=0;
04108       PathStPtr   pTempPath = Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath;
04109       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
04110 
04111 
04112       //loop through to get all the nodes
04113       while( pTempPath )
04114       {
04115             uiNumOfNodes++;
04116             pTempPath = pTempPath->pNext;
04117       }
04118 
04119 
04120       //Save the number of the nodes
04121       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumOfNodes, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
04122       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
04123       {
04124             return(FALSE);
04125       }
04126 
04127       //loop through all the nodes and add them
04128       pTempPath = Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath;
04129 
04130 
04131       //loop through nodes and save all the nodes
04132       while( pTempPath )
04133       {
04134             //Save the number of the nodes
04135             FileWrite( hFile, pTempPath, sizeof( PathSt ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
04136             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( PathSt ) )
04137             {
04138                   return(FALSE);
04139             }
04140             
04141             pTempPath = pTempPath->pNext;
04142       }
04143 
04144       
04145 
04146       return( TRUE );
04147 }
04148 
04149 
04150 
04151 BOOLEAN LoadMercPathToSoldierStruct( HWFILE hFile, UINT8    ubID )
04152 {
04153       UINT32      uiNumOfNodes=0;
04154       PathStPtr   pTempPath = NULL;
04155       PathStPtr   pTemp = NULL;
04156       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
04157       UINT32      cnt;
04158 
04159 
04160 
04161       //The list SHOULD be empty at this point
04162 /*
04163       //if there is nodes, loop through and delete them
04164       if( Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath )
04165       {
04166             pTempPath = Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath;
04167             while( pTempPath )
04168             {
04169                   pTemp = pTempPath;
04170                   pTempPath = pTempPath->pNext;
04171 
04172                   MemFree( pTemp );
04173                   pTemp=NULL;
04174             }
04175 
04176             Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath = NULL;
04177       }
04178 */
04179 
04180       //Load the number of the nodes
04181       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumOfNodes, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
04182       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
04183       {
04184             return(FALSE);
04185       }
04186 
04187       //load all the nodes
04188       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumOfNodes; cnt++ )
04189       {
04190             //Allocate memory for the new node
04191             pTemp = (PathStPtr) MemAlloc( sizeof( PathSt ) );
04192             if( pTemp == NULL )
04193                   return( FALSE );
04194             memset( pTemp, 0 , sizeof( PathSt ) );
04195 
04196 
04197             //Load the node
04198             FileRead( hFile, pTemp, sizeof( PathSt ), &uiNumBytesRead );
04199             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( PathSt ) )
04200             {
04201                   return(FALSE);
04202             }
04203 
04204             //Put the node into the list 
04205             if( cnt == 0 )
04206             {
04207                   pTempPath = pTemp;
04208                   pTemp->pPrev = NULL;
04209             }
04210             else
04211             {
04212                   pTempPath->pNext = pTemp;
04213                   pTemp->pPrev = pTempPath;
04214 
04215                   pTempPath = pTempPath->pNext;
04216             }
04217 
04218             pTemp->pNext = NULL;
04219       }
04220 
04221       //move to beginning of list
04222       pTempPath = MoveToBeginningOfPathList( pTempPath );
04223 
04224       Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath = pTempPath;
04225       if( Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath )
04226             Menptr[ ubID ].pMercPath->pPrev = NULL;
04227 
04228       return( TRUE );
04229 }
04230

04232 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04233 void InitSaveGameFilePosition()
04234 {
04235       CHAR8       zFileName[ MAX_PATH ];
04236 
04237       sprintf( zFileName, "%s\\SaveGameFilePos%2d.txt", gSaveDir, gubSaveGameLoc );
04238 
04239       FileDelete( zFileName );
04240 }
04241 
04242 void SaveGameFilePosition( INT32 iPos, STR pMsg )
04243 {
04244       HWFILE      hFile;
04245       CHAR8       zTempString[512];
04246       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
04247       UINT32      uiStrLen=0;
04248       CHAR8       zFileName[MAX_PATH];
04249 
04250       sprintf( zFileName, "%s\\SaveGameFilePos%2d.txt", gSaveDir, gubSaveGameLoc );
04251 
04252       // create the save game file
04253       hFile = FileOpen( zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
04254       if( !hFile )
04255       {
04256             FileClose( hFile );
04257             return;
04258       }
04259 
04260       FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
04261 
04262       sprintf( zTempString, "%8d     %s\n", iPos, pMsg );
04263       uiStrLen = strlen( zTempString );
04264 
04265       FileWrite( hFile, zTempString, uiStrLen, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04266       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiStrLen )
04267       {
04268             FileClose( hFile );
04269             return;
04270       }
04271 
04272       FileClose( hFile );
04273 }

04295 
04296       // create the save game file
04297       hFile = FileOpen( zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
04298       if( !hFile )
04299       {
04300             FileClose( hFile );
04301             return;
04302       }
04303 
04304       FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
04305 
04306       sprintf( zTempString, "%8d     %s\n", iPos, pMsg );
04307       uiStrLen = strlen( zTempString );
04308 
04309       FileWrite( hFile, zTempString, uiStrLen, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04310       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiStrLen )
04311       {
04312             FileClose( hFile );
04313             return;
04314       }

04317

04770 
04771       gubBoxingMatchesWon = sGeneralInfo.ubBoxingMatchesWon;

04783       //load the global player num
04784       gbPlayerNum = sGeneralInfo.ubPlayerNum;
04785 
04786       //New stuff for the Prebattle interface / autoresolve
04787       gfPersistantPBI                                                   = sGeneralInfo.fPersistantPBI;
04788       gubEnemyEncounterCode                                 = sGeneralInfo.ubEnemyEncounterCode;

04802   gfPlayerTeamSawJoey     = sGeneralInfo.fPlayerTeamSawJoey;

04806 }

04808 BOOLEAN SavePreRandomNumbersToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
04809 {
04810       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
04811 
04812       //Save the Prerandom number index
04813       FileWrite( hFile, &guiPreRandomIndex, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
04814       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
04815       {
04816             return( FALSE );
04817       }
04818 
04819       //Save the Prerandom number index
04820       FileWrite( hFile, guiPreRandomNums, sizeof( UINT32 ) * MAX_PREGENERATED_NUMS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04821       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) * MAX_PREGENERATED_NUMS )
04822       {
04823             return( FALSE );
04824       }
04825 
04826       return( TRUE );
04827 }

04850 BOOLEAN LoadMeanwhileDefsFromSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
04851 {
04852       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
04853 
04854       if ( guiSaveGameVersion < 72 )
04855       {
04856             //Load the array of meanwhile defs
04857             FileRead( hFile, gMeanwhileDef, sizeof( MEANWHILE_DEFINITION ) * (NUM_MEANWHILES-1), &uiNumBytesRead );
04858             if ( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( MEANWHILE_DEFINITION ) * (NUM_MEANWHILES-1) )
04859             {
04860                   return( FALSE );
04861             }
04862             // and set the last one
04863             memset( &(gMeanwhileDef[ NUM_MEANWHILES - 1]), 0, sizeof( MEANWHILE_DEFINITION ) );
04864 
04865       }
04866       else
04867       {
04868             //Load the array of meanwhile defs
04869             FileRead( hFile, gMeanwhileDef, sizeof( MEANWHILE_DEFINITION ) * NUM_MEANWHILES, &uiNumBytesRead );
04870             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( MEANWHILE_DEFINITION ) * NUM_MEANWHILES )
04871             {
04872                   return( FALSE );
04873             }
04874       }
04875 
04876       return( TRUE );
04877 }

04882 
04883       //Save the array of meanwhile defs

04893 BOOLEAN DoesUserHaveEnoughHardDriveSpace()
04894 {
04895       UINT32                  uiBytesFree=0;
04896 
04897       uiBytesFree = GetFreeSpaceOnHardDriveWhereGameIsRunningFrom( );
04898 
04899       //check to see if there is enough hard drive space
04900       if( uiBytesFree < REQUIRED_FREE_SPACE )
04901       {
04902             return( FALSE );
04903       }
04904 
04905       return( TRUE );
04906 }

04910 void InitShutDownMapTempFileTest( BOOLEAN fInit, STR pNameOfFile, UINT8 ubSaveGameID )
04911 {
04912       CHAR8       zFileName[MAX_PATH];
04913       HWFILE      hFile;
04914       CHAR8       zTempString[512];
04915       UINT32      uiStrLen;
04916       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
04917 
04918       //strcpy( gzNameOfMapTempFile, pNameOfFile);
04919       sprintf( gzNameOfMapTempFile, "%s%d", pNameOfFile, ubSaveGameID );
04920 
04921       sprintf( zFileName, "%s\\%s.txt", gSaveDir, gzNameOfMapTempFile );
04922 
04923       if( fInit )
04924       {
04925             guiNumberOfMapTempFiles = 0;        //Test:  To determine where the temp files are crashing
04926             guiSizeOfTempFiles = 0;
04927 
04928             if( FileExists( zFileName ) )
04929             {
04930                   FileDelete( zFileName );
04931             }
04932       }
04933       else
04934       {
04935             // create the save game file
04936             hFile = FileOpen( zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
04937             if( !hFile )
04938             {
04939                   FileClose( hFile );
04940                   return;
04941             }
04942 
04943             FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
04944 
04945             sprintf( zTempString, "Number Of Files: %6d.  Size of all files: %6d.\n", guiNumberOfMapTempFiles, guiSizeOfTempFiles );
04946             uiStrLen = strlen( zTempString );
04947 
04948             FileWrite( hFile, zTempString, uiStrLen, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04949             if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiStrLen )
04950             {
04951                   FileClose( hFile );
04952                   return;
04953             }
04954 
04955             FileClose( hFile );
04956 
04957       }
04958 }
04959 
04960 void WriteTempFileNameToFile( STR pFileName, UINT32 uiSizeOfFile, HFILE hSaveFile )
04961 {
04962       HWFILE      hFile;
04963       CHAR8       zTempString[512];
04964       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
04965       UINT32      uiStrLen=0;
04966 
04967       CHAR8       zFileName[MAX_PATH];
04968 
04969       guiSizeOfTempFiles += uiSizeOfFile;
04970 
04971       sprintf( zFileName, "%s\\%s.txt", gSaveDir, gzNameOfMapTempFile );
04972 
04973       // create the save game file
04974       hFile = FileOpen( zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
04975       if( !hFile )
04976       {
04977             FileClose( hFile );
04978             return;
04979       }
04980 
04981       FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
04982 
04983       sprintf( zTempString, "%8d   %6d   %s\n", FileGetPos( hSaveFile ), uiSizeOfFile, pFileName );
04984       uiStrLen = strlen( zTempString );
04985 
04986       FileWrite( hFile, zTempString, uiStrLen, &uiNumBytesWritten );
04987       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiStrLen )
04988       {
04989             FileClose( hFile );
04990             return;
04991       }
04992 
04993       FileClose( hFile );
04994 }

04997 
04998 void GetBestPossibleSectorXYZValues( INT16 *psSectorX, INT16 *psSectorY, INT8 *pbSectorZ )
04999 {
05000       //if the current sector is valid
05001       if( gfWorldLoaded )
05002       {
05003             *psSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
05004             *psSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
05005             *pbSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
05006       }
05007       else if( iCurrentTacticalSquad != NO_CURRENT_SQUAD && Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ] )
05008       {
05009             if( Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ]->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT )
05010             {
05011                   *psSectorX = Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ]->sSectorX;
05012                   *psSectorY = Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ]->sSectorY;
05013                   *pbSectorZ = Squad[ iCurrentTacticalSquad ][ 0 ]->bSectorZ;
05014             }
05015       }
05016       else
05017       {
05018             INT16                         sSoldierCnt;
05019             SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
05020             INT16                         bLastTeamID;
05021             INT8                          bCount=0;
05022             BOOLEAN                       fFoundAMerc=FALSE;
05023 
05024             // Set locator to first merc
05025             sSoldierCnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05026             bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
05027 
05028             //loop through all the mercs on the players team to find the one that is not moving
05029             for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ sSoldierCnt ]; sSoldierCnt <= bLastTeamID; sSoldierCnt++,pSoldier++)
05030             {
05031                   if( pSoldier->bActive )
05032                   {
05033                         if ( pSoldier->bAssignment != IN_TRANSIT && !pSoldier->fBetweenSectors)
05034                         {
05035                               //we found an alive, merc that is not moving
05036                               *psSectorX = pSoldier->sSectorX;
05037                               *psSectorY = pSoldier->sSectorY;
05038                               *pbSectorZ = pSoldier->bSectorZ;
05039                               fFoundAMerc = TRUE;
05040                               break;
05041                         }
05042                   }
05043             }
05044 
05045             //if we didnt find a merc
05046             if( !fFoundAMerc )
05047             {
05048                   // Set locator to first merc
05049                   sSoldierCnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
05050                   bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
05051 
05052                   //loop through all the mercs and find one that is moving
05053                   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ sSoldierCnt ]; sSoldierCnt <= bLastTeamID; sSoldierCnt++,pSoldier++)
05054                   {
05055                         if( pSoldier->bActive )
05056                         {
05057                               //we found an alive, merc that is not moving
05058                               *psSectorX = pSoldier->sSectorX;
05059                               *psSectorY = pSoldier->sSectorY;
05060                               *pbSectorZ = pSoldier->bSectorZ;
05061                               fFoundAMerc = TRUE;
05062                               break;
05063                         }
05064                   }
05065 
05066                   //if we STILL havent found a merc, give up and use the -1, -1, -1
05067                   if( !fFoundAMerc )
05068                   {
05069                         *psSectorX = gWorldSectorX;
05070                         *psSectorY = gWorldSectorY;
05071                         *pbSectorZ = gbWorldSectorZ;
05072                   }
05073             }
05074       }
05075 }
05076
