05078 void PauseBeforeSaveGame( void )
05079 {
05080       //if we are not in the save load screen
05081       if( guiCurrentScreen != SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN )
05082       {
05083             //Pause the game
05084             PauseGame();
05085       }
05086 }
05087 
05088 void UnPauseAfterSaveGame( void )
05089 {
05090       //if we are not in the save load screen
05091       if( guiCurrentScreen != SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN )
05092       {
05093             //UnPause time compression
05094             UnPauseGame();
05095       }
05096 }
05097 
05098 void TruncateStrategicGroupSizes()
05099 {
05100       GROUP *pGroup;
05101       SECTORINFO *pSector;
05102       INT32 i;
05103 
05104       INT32 iMaxEnemyGroupSize = gGameExternalOptions.iMaxEnemyGroupSize;
05105 
05106 
05107       for( i = SEC_A1; i < SEC_P16; i++ )
05108       {
05109             pSector = &SectorInfo[ i ];
05110             if( pSector->ubNumAdmins + pSector->ubNumTroops + pSector->ubNumElites > iMaxEnemyGroupSize )
05111             {
05112                   if( pSector->ubNumAdmins > pSector->ubNumTroops )
05113                   {
05114                         if( pSector->ubNumAdmins > pSector->ubNumElites )
05115                         {
05116                               pSector->ubNumAdmins = 20;
05117                               pSector->ubNumTroops = 0;
05118                               pSector->ubNumElites = 0;
05119                         }
05120                         else
05121                         {
05122                               pSector->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05123                               pSector->ubNumTroops = 0;
05124                               pSector->ubNumElites = 20;
05125                         }
05126                   }
05127                   else if( pSector->ubNumTroops > pSector->ubNumElites )
05128                   {
05129                         if( pSector->ubNumTroops > pSector->ubNumAdmins )
05130                         {
05131                               pSector->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05132                               pSector->ubNumTroops = 20;
05133                               pSector->ubNumElites = 0;
05134                         }
05135                         else
05136                         {
05137                               pSector->ubNumAdmins = 20;
05138                               pSector->ubNumTroops = 0;
05139                               pSector->ubNumElites = 0;
05140                         }
05141                   }
05142                   else
05143                   {
05144                         if( pSector->ubNumElites > pSector->ubNumTroops )
05145                         {
05146                               pSector->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05147                               pSector->ubNumTroops = 0;
05148                               pSector->ubNumElites = 20;
05149                         }
05150                         else
05151                         {
05152                               pSector->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05153                               pSector->ubNumTroops = 20;
05154                               pSector->ubNumElites = 0;
05155                         }
05156                   }
05157             }
05158             //militia
05159             if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] + pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] + pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] > iMaxEnemyGroupSize )
05160             {
05161                   if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] > pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] )
05162                   {
05163                         if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] > pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] )
05164                         {
05165                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 20;
05166                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 0;
05167                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] = 0;
05168                         }
05169                         else
05170                         {
05171                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 0;
05172                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 0;
05173                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] = 20;
05174                         }
05175                   }
05176                   else if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] > pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] )
05177                   {
05178                         if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] > pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] )
05179                         {
05180                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 0;
05181                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 20;
05182                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] = 0;
05183                         }
05184                         else
05185                         {
05186                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 20;
05187                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 0;
05188                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] = 0;
05189                         }
05190                   }
05191                   else
05192                   {
05193                         if( pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] > pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] )
05194                         {
05195                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 0;
05196                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 0;
05197                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] = 20;
05198                         }
05199                         else
05200                         {
05201                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[0] = 0;
05202                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[1] = 20;
05203                               pSector->ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[2] = 0;
05204                         }
05205                   }
05206             }
05207       }
05208       //Enemy groups
05209       pGroup = gpGroupList;
05210       while( pGroup )
05211       {
05212             if( !pGroup->fPlayer )
05213             {
05214                   if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins + pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops + pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites > iMaxEnemyGroupSize )
05215                   {
05216                         pGroup->ubGroupSize = 20;
05217                         if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins > pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops )
05218                         {
05219                               if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins > pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites )
05220                               {
05221                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = 20;
05222                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = 0;
05223                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = 0;
05224                               }
05225                               else
05226                               {
05227                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05228                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = 0;
05229                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = 20;
05230                               }
05231                         }
05232                         else if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops > pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites )
05233                         {
05234                               if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops > pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins )
05235                               {
05236                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05237                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = 20;
05238                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = 0;
05239                               }
05240                               else
05241                               {
05242                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = 20;
05243                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = 0;
05244                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = 0;
05245                               }
05246                         }
05247                         else
05248                         {
05249                               if( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites > pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops )
05250                               {
05251                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05252                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = 0;
05253                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = 20;
05254                               }
05255                               else
05256                               {
05257                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = 0;
05258                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = 20;
05259                                     pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = 0;
05260                               }
05261                         }
05262                   }
05263             }
05264             pGroup = pGroup->next;
05265       }
05266 }
05267 
05268 
05269 void UpdateMercMercContractInfo()
05270 {
05271       UINT8 ubCnt;
05272       SOLDIERTYPE                   *pSoldier;
05273 
05274       for( ubCnt=BIFF; ubCnt<= BUBBA; ubCnt++ )
05275       {
05276             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubCnt, TRUE );
05277 
05278             //if the merc is on the team
05279             if( pSoldier == NULL )
05280                   continue;
05281 
05282             gMercProfiles[ ubCnt ].iMercMercContractLength = pSoldier->iTotalContractLength;
05283 
05284             pSoldier->iTotalContractLength = 0;
05285       }
05286 }
05287 
05288 INT8 GetNumberForAutoSave( BOOLEAN fLatestAutoSave )
05289 {
05290       CHAR  zFileName1[MAX_PATH];
05291       CHAR  zFileName2[MAX_PATH];
05292       HWFILE      hFile;
05293       BOOLEAN     fFile1Exist, fFile2Exist;
05294       SGP_FILETIME      CreationTime1, LastAccessedTime1, LastWriteTime1;
05295       SGP_FILETIME      CreationTime2, LastAccessedTime2, LastWriteTime2;
05296 
05297       fFile1Exist = FALSE;
05298       fFile2Exist = FALSE;
05299 
05300 
05301       //The name of the file
05302       sprintf( zFileName1, "%s\\Auto%02d.%S", gSaveDir, 0, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
05303       sprintf( zFileName2, "%s\\Auto%02d.%S", gSaveDir, 1, pMessageStrings[ MSG_SAVEEXTENSION ] );
05304 
05305       if( FileExists( zFileName1 ) )
05306       {
05307             hFile = FileOpen( zFileName1, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
05308 
05309             GetFileManFileTime( hFile, &CreationTime1, &LastAccessedTime1, &LastWriteTime1 );
05310 
05311             FileClose( hFile );
05312 
05313             fFile1Exist = TRUE;
05314       }
05315 
05316       if( FileExists( zFileName2 ) )
05317       {
05318             hFile = FileOpen( zFileName2, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
05319 
05320             GetFileManFileTime( hFile, &CreationTime2, &LastAccessedTime2, &LastWriteTime2 );
05321 
05322             FileClose( hFile );
05323 
05324             fFile2Exist = TRUE;
05325       }
05326 
05327       if( !fFile1Exist && !fFile2Exist )
05328             return( -1 );
05329       else if( fFile1Exist && !fFile2Exist )
05330       {
05331             if( fLatestAutoSave )
05332                   return( 0 );
05333             else
05334                   return( -1 );
05335       }
05336       else if( !fFile1Exist && fFile2Exist )
05337       {
05338             if( fLatestAutoSave )
05339                   return( 1 );
05340             else
05341                   return( -1 );
05342       }
05343       else
05344       {           
05345             if( CompareSGPFileTimes( &LastWriteTime1, &LastWriteTime2 ) > 0 )
05346                   return( 0 );
05347             else
05348                   return( 1 );
05349       }
05350 }
05351 
05352 void HandleOldBobbyRMailOrders()
05353 {
05354       INT32 iCnt;
05355       INT32 iNewListCnt=0;
05356 
05357       if( LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed != 0 )
05358       {
05359             //Allocate memory for the list
05360             gpNewBobbyrShipments = (NewBobbyRayOrderStruct *) MemAlloc( sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ) * LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed );
05361             if( gpNewBobbyrShipments == NULL )
05362             {
05363                   Assert(0);
05364                   return;
05365             }
05366 
05367             giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment = LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed;
05368 
05369             //loop through and add the old items to the new list
05370             for( iCnt=0; iCnt< LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems; iCnt++ )
05371             {
05372                   //if this slot is used
05373                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[iCnt].fActive )
05374                   {
05375                         //copy over the purchase info
05376                         memcpy( gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].BobbyRayPurchase, 
05377                                                 LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[iCnt].BobbyRayPurchase,
05378                                                 sizeof( BobbyRayPurchaseStruct ) * MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT );
05379                         
05380                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].fActive = TRUE;
05381                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].ubDeliveryLoc = BR_DRASSEN;
05382                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].ubDeliveryMethod = 0;
05383                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].ubNumberPurchases = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[iCnt].ubNumberPurchases;
05384                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].uiPackageWeight = 1;
05385                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].uiOrderedOnDayNum = GetWorldDay();
05386                         gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iNewListCnt ].fDisplayedInShipmentPage = TRUE;
05387 
05388                         iNewListCnt++;
05389                   }
05390             }
05391 
05392             //Clear out the old list
05393             LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed = 0;
05394             MemFree( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray );
05395             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = NULL;
05396       }
05397 }
05398 
05399       
05400 UINT32 CalcJA2EncryptionSet( SAVED_GAME_HEADER * pSaveGameHeader )
05401 {
05402       UINT32      uiEncryptionSet = 0;
05403 
05404       uiEncryptionSet = pSaveGameHeader->uiSavedGameVersion;
05405       uiEncryptionSet *= pSaveGameHeader->uiFlags;
05406       uiEncryptionSet += pSaveGameHeader->iCurrentBalance;
05407       uiEncryptionSet *= (pSaveGameHeader->ubNumOfMercsOnPlayersTeam + 1);
05408       uiEncryptionSet += pSaveGameHeader->bSectorZ * 3;
05409       uiEncryptionSet += pSaveGameHeader->ubLoadScreenID;
05410 
05411       if ( pSaveGameHeader->fAlternateSector )
05412       {
05413             uiEncryptionSet += 7;
05414       }
05415 
05416       if ( pSaveGameHeader->uiRandom % 2 == 0 )
05417       {
05418             uiEncryptionSet++;
05419 
05420             if ( pSaveGameHeader->uiRandom % 7 == 0)
05421             {
05422                   uiEncryptionSet++;
05423                   if ( pSaveGameHeader->uiRandom % 23 == 0 )
05424                   {
05425                         uiEncryptionSet++;
05426                   }
05427                   if ( pSaveGameHeader->uiRandom % 79 == 0 )
05428                   {
05429                         uiEncryptionSet += 2;
05430                   }
05431             }
05432       }
05433 
05434       #ifdef GERMAN
05435             uiEncryptionSet *= 11;
05436       #endif
05437 
05438       uiEncryptionSet = uiEncryptionSet % 10;
05439 
05440       uiEncryptionSet += pSaveGameHeader->uiDay / 10;
05441 
05442       uiEncryptionSet = uiEncryptionSet % 19;
05443 
05444       // now pick a different set of #s depending on what game options we've chosen
05445       if ( pSaveGameHeader->sInitialGameOptions.fGunNut )
05446       {
05447             uiEncryptionSet += BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 6;
05448       }
05449 
05450       if ( pSaveGameHeader->sInitialGameOptions.ubGameStyle == STYLE_SCIFI)
05451       {
05452             uiEncryptionSet += BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3;
05453       }
05454 
05455       switch( pSaveGameHeader->sInitialGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel )
05456       {
05457             case DIF_LEVEL_EASY:
05458                   uiEncryptionSet += 0;
05459                   break;
05460             case DIF_LEVEL_MEDIUM:
05461                   uiEncryptionSet += BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS;
05462                   break;
05463             case DIF_LEVEL_HARD:
05464                   uiEncryptionSet += BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 2;
05465                   break;
05466             case DIF_LEVEL_INSANE:
05467                   uiEncryptionSet += BASE_NUMBER_OF_ROTATION_ARRAYS * 3;
05468                   break;
05469       }
05470 
05471       return( uiEncryptionSet );
05472 }
